solution_line_template: At the end of Monday, there are {initial_books} - {books_taken_out_monday} = <<{initial_books}-{books_taken_out_monday}={books_after_monday}>>{books_after_monday} books left.
At the end of Tuesday, there are {books_after_monday} + {books_brought_back_tuesday} = <<{books_after_monday}+{books_brought_back_tuesday}={books_after_tuesday}>>{books_after_tuesday} books.
